_source.short_desc: All-in-one digital marketing tool trusted by 7,000,000 users.
_source.long_desc:
With over 55 products, tools and add-ons across online visibility management, including tools for search, content, social media and market research, data for more than 142 countries, seamless integration with Google and task management platforms, Semrush is a critical solution for all companies who are serious about online presence.
Semrush in numbers: over 800 million unique domains monitored for 142 geo databases; over 43 trillion backlinks; 21 billion keywords; over 10 million users.
_source.pricing_details:
Pro: $119.95/month

Guru: $229.95/month

Business: $449.95/month

Enterprise: upon request
_source.target_audience: Designed for marketing managers in businesses of all sizes that want to optimize their online visibility across key channels and create engaging content for users.

related_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
related_products.features: Detangle SEO, guide your content strategy, and generate leads with intuitive SEO tools that put data behind your organic search efforts, and make measurement and optimization simple. Figure out which keywords you're ranking for and which ones you're not, see which competitors are beating you in organic search, and what you should start writing about to improve your rankings. Sign up for free, and start generating leads using HubSpot's SEO tools.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform for creating an effective SEO strategy.
related_products.features: Marketing 360 - SEO marketing platform gives the business owner insights into powerful analytics from keyword tracking, content generation, page ranking analysis, and trend analysis to better identify keyword growth opportunities for conversions. This all-in-one marketing platform includes intuitive analysis that creates dynamic reports so the analysis if keyword growth by position can be easily understood and optimized.

related_products.short_desc: AI that helps you create better SEO content, faster.
related_products.features:
Over 200,000 content creators, SEO's and agencies use Frase to research, write, and optimize high-quality SEO content in minutes instead of hours.

Watch the 2-min explainer video here: https://youtu.be/CNGbsLPVMpQ

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one SEO suite of tools. Helps businesses to improve rankings, increase traffic, and gain visibility in search results.
related_products.features: Moz Pro is an all-in-one SEO suite of tools. It allows businesses to improve rankings, increase traffic, and gain more visibility in search results. Main features include keyword research, rank tracking, backlink analysis, and site audit. Keyword research tools allow businesses to improve their content and strategies. Businesses can uncover competitive advantages by tracking competitors through SERPs, fix technical problems with the help of Moz Pro suggestions and perform weekly site audits.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based platform for SEO and online marketing professionals
related_products.features: SE Ranking is a cloud-based platform for SEO and online marketing professionals that provides a complete set of tools for comprehensive site audit, competitor analysis, website ranking, keyword suggestion and grouping, backlink monitoring, automated professional reporting, and much more. Besides standard SEO tools the system offers a set of additional features such as White Label and Marketing Plan aimed at bringing your professional digital services to a whole new level.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-One platform for SEO/PPC: Advance Rank Tracking, Site Audit, Keyword/Competitor Analytics, Backlink Analysis, Keyword Clustering
related_products.features: Serpstat is an all-in-one SEO platform that helps market experts analyze competitors, perform keyword research for SEO and ads, track online positions and backlinks of any websites and their online competitors.  Serpstat provides a set of tools for link building, text analytics, clustering, finding site errors and makes recommendations on how to fix SEO errors to boost site visibility in Google and Yandex.

related_products.short_desc: The All-in-One SEO & SEM platform with in-depth competitive insights. Fast insights, Intuitive UI. Get Started Free!
related_products.features: Simplify your SEO process with Raven by TapClicks, a full suite of SEO tools with in-depth competitive insights.  Audit any site, find backlink opportunities, conduct keyword research, track your keyword rankings, and gain insights into your SEM competitors in seconds.  Fast insights, Intuitive UI.  Get Started Free!

related_products.short_desc: AgencyAnalytics is an all-in-one reporting dashboard that impresses clients and saves time. Integrate SEO, PPC, social, email & more.
related_products.features:
AgencyAnalytics is an enterprise SEO & marketing dashboard that impresses clients and saves time. Built in SEO tools include rank tracking, site audits and backlinks reports. 

White label the dashboard and give clients their own personal logins to let them see your awesome marketing campaign at work! 

Schedule automated, branded reports to provide clients a complete SEO update. Integrate 60+ other services like social media and PPC to get the whole picture.

related_products.short_desc: Yext organizes a business's facts so it can provide direct answers to consumer questions - wherever people search.
related_products.features:
Today, the majority of search bars on business websites just scan for keywords and return a list of links, rather than actually answering questions. That's a frustrating brand experience for your customers, and it's blocking you from revenue.

With Yext, the difference is Answers. We've built a modern, AI-powered Answers Platform that gives your customers direct answers anywhere they ask questions. 

Google brought AI search to consumers. Yext is bringing AI search to the enterprise.

related_products.short_desc: AI SEO and Content Optimization tool along with custom KW research libraries for over 200 blog niches.
related_products.features: This AI-powered SEO toolset is built for just for bloggers. It tells you what to put in your blog post and title, so you can write perfectly optimized content in half the time. RankIQ also has a hand-picked library of the lowest competition high traffic keywords for every blog niche (over 200 niches and counting). The keyword research is done by one of the top keyword research experts in the world.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based platform for SEO and online marketing professionals
similar_products.features: SE Ranking is a cloud-based platform for SEO and online marketing professionals that provides a complete set of tools for comprehensive site audit, competitor analysis, website ranking, keyword suggestion and grouping, backlink monitoring, automated professional reporting, and much more. Besides standard SEO tools the system offers a set of additional features such as White Label and Marketing Plan aimed at bringing your professional digital services to a whole new level.

similar_products.short_desc: AgencyAnalytics is an all-in-one reporting dashboard that impresses clients and saves time. Integrate SEO, PPC, social, email & more.
similar_products.features:
AgencyAnalytics is an enterprise SEO & marketing dashboard that impresses clients and saves time. Built in SEO tools include rank tracking, site audits and backlinks reports. 

White label the dashboard and give clients their own personal logins to let them see your awesome marketing campaign at work! 

Schedule automated, branded reports to provide clients a complete SEO update. Integrate 60+ other services like social media and PPC to get the whole picture.

similar_products.short_desc: AI-powered SEO tool that helps businesses optimize website content & analyze articles by transforming text into machine-friendly data.
similar_products.features:
WordLift is an AI-powered SEO tool that helps you reach your maximum potential audience.

WordLift analyses your text and adds schema.org markup that search engines understand.

By adding structured data, WordLift opens new opportunities: content writers can enrich their websites with recommendations, automatic interlinking, free images, and more. As a result, the UX becomes more engaging.

WordLift also measures your SEO performance to help you improve your strategy.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your exposure online with flexible SEO solutions by Web.com letting you create an SEO package unique to your goals.
similar_products.features: With Web.com, our experts design search engine optimization solutions making it easy to get your business found online across top search engines the moment people are searching for businesses like yours. It's the budget friendly online marketing service that's perfect if you are looking to improve your online visibility and exposure across search engines overtime. With our flexible a-la-carte solutions, you can build an SEO bundle that's unique to your business goals at a price you can afford.

similar_products.short_desc: AI that helps you create better SEO content, faster.
similar_products.features:
Over 200,000 content creators, SEO's and agencies use Frase to research, write, and optimize high-quality SEO content in minutes instead of hours.

Watch the 2-min explainer video here: https://youtu.be/CNGbsLPVMpQ

similar_products.short_desc: A SaaS based reporting solution that helps digital marketers build reports with PERFORMANCE INSIGHTS in writing, all in a few seconds.
similar_products.features:
DataMyth is a SaaS based reporting solution which helps digital marketers generate reports with AUTOMATED ANALYSIS & PERFORMANCE INSIGHTS in writing, which helps marketers understand what is working & what is not.  Marketers can save all the time spent building reports and analysing the data, and get the reports in a few seconds. 

With the time saved, digital marketers can focus on optimization & strategy while we take care of all reporting needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
similar_products.features: Detangle SEO, guide your content strategy, and generate leads with intuitive SEO tools that put data behind your organic search efforts, and make measurement and optimization simple. Figure out which keywords you're ranking for and which ones you're not, see which competitors are beating you in organic search, and what you should start writing about to improve your rankings. Sign up for free, and start generating leads using HubSpot's SEO tools.

similar_products.short_desc: The All-in-One SEO & SEM platform with in-depth competitive insights. Fast insights, Intuitive UI. Get Started Free!
similar_products.features: Simplify your SEO process with Raven by TapClicks, a full suite of SEO tools with in-depth competitive insights.  Audit any site, find backlink opportunities, conduct keyword research, track your keyword rankings, and gain insights into your SEM competitors in seconds.  Fast insights, Intuitive UI.  Get Started Free!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-One platform for SEO/PPC: Advance Rank Tracking, Site Audit, Keyword/Competitor Analytics, Backlink Analysis, Keyword Clustering
similar_products.features: Serpstat is an all-in-one SEO platform that helps market experts analyze competitors, perform keyword research for SEO and ads, track online positions and backlinks of any websites and their online competitors.  Serpstat provides a set of tools for link building, text analytics, clustering, finding site errors and makes recommendations on how to fix SEO errors to boost site visibility in Google and Yandex.

similar_products.short_desc:
Powerful API Stack for Data-Driven Marketers.
We provide comprehensive SEO and digital marketing data solutions via API.
similar_products.features:
DataForSEO provides comprehensive data solutions focused on marketing automation, SEO analytics and e-commerce optimization. 

Since its inception in 2016, DataForSEO grew up from an SEO data mining company to the leading provider of API-first marketing data solutions. 

DataForSEO offers the most diverse stack of APIs and databases in the industry. We can provide you with all the data your digital marketing project requires.

similar_products.short_desc: Create super-optimized SEO landing pages and target all relevant keywords for any site. Simple to set up.
similar_products.features: Verbolia offers a solution that automatically generates perfect SEO pages - directly on your domain. You start by importing all the keywords you want to target. For each keyword a dedicated SEO landing page is created, which is fully optimized in terms of page speed, content and linking. No need of your IT team, it's easy to set up and to use. Finally, the solution is the fastest and most efficient way to SEO success!

similar_products.short_desc: Our local SEO solution gives our customers control of their local points of sale leading to 140% increase in unbranded searches.
similar_products.features: Uberall is a complete local SEO solution which gives our customers complete control of their local points of sale leading to an average 140% increase in unbranded searches. Our solution optimises individual points of sale for organic and paid search and our advanced analytics capabilities gives you the power to analyse the impact and ROI of your local marketing efforts.  Manage local at the brand and local level, create a better customer experience and completely optimise for local SEO

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Marketing software automates the processes of creating, publishing, and tracking the ROI of content-related marketing campaigns. Common functionality of these solutions includes workflow management, collaborative editing, scheduled publishing, SEO analytics, and social integration.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Analytics Software enables organizations to track and analyze information regarding their website visitors including who they are, how they found the site, what path they take through the site and the actions they take while there. Using these measurements can help organizations gauge the effectiveness of their marketing and advertising efforts as well as how effectively their website operates as a sales tool. Web Analytic applications can also assist with the process of advertising on the web by evaluating the popularity and effectiveness of keyword search terms. Web Analytics software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_products.short_desc: The ultimate market research tool: 95% of users get more data, more easily when they switch to Typeform
related_products.features: Get better market research insights with interactive forms that are actually fun to complete, and super easy to make. Typeforms are fully customizable to your brand, with a sleek interface that's responsive and asks one question at a time-just like a real conversation. Get useful insights and reports in your dashboard, plus 120+ integrations let you hook Typeform up to your favorite apps, so you can automatically send responses wherever you want, as they come in.

related_products.short_desc: Qualtrics CoreXM is the top-rated market research tool to drive better decisions with real-time insights and reporting.
related_products.features: Faster results, deeper market knowledge with Qualtrics. Use market research tools designed to go deeper. From ad testing and product design to market segmentation and competitor benchmarking, our market research platform gives you not just the knowledge you need but the insights and actions to create transformative results. Go from 'what' to 'why' with deep processing and predictive capabilities including sentiment analysis and market trend reporting. Take control of your market research data.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

related_products.short_desc: Tango Card bundles simple technology, great rewards, and expert service to help companies get the most out of their reward programs.
related_products.features: Tango Card provides leading incentive-delivery technology to organizations in the B2B space. Globally, enterprise companies use this technology to deliver an extensive catalog of domestic and global e-gift cards as part of consumer loyalty programs, sales incentive programs, health and wellness engagement, and employee recognition. Tango Card believes instantly delivering the most desirable rewards maximizes impact and drives real business results.

related_products.short_desc: Survey software for the creation, distribution, and analysis of surveys, polls, and forms.
related_products.features:
QuestionPro is a SaaS survey solutions company offering applications to measure and manage customer experience, employee engagement, and the pulse of the audience. Obtain accurate insights using conjoint analysis, MaxDiff analysis, sentiment analysis, TURF analysis, heatmap analysis, etc. Export data to external tools like SPSS and R Software and integrate with 20+ applications.

We are ISO 27001 certified and comply with leading data security standards and data privacy laws including GDPR.

related_products.short_desc: MediaRadar is a customizable advertising intelligence platform that is targeted to the needs of media sellers, buyers, and planners.
related_products.features: MediaRadar's award-winning advertising intelligence solutions deliver timely cross-media insights that are targeted to those that are involved in the media selling, planning, or buying processes. Media selling teams rely on MediaRadar to prospect for new business, create compelling pitches and connect with the right buyers. Agencies and marketers use MediaRadar to create the best media mix, monitor their competitors, and uncover new advertising opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Get answers fast with Nextiva Surveys, a custom online market research software. Collect the answers you need to understand audience.
related_products.features: Get answers fast with Nextiva Surveys, our custom online market research software. Collect the answers you need to understand your audience and make better decisions. Featuring nine question types, survey templates, email notifications, skip logic, and more, Nextiva Surveys provides the tools needed to measure respondents. Plus businesses can customize landing pages, thank you pages, colors, and everything in between! Seamlessly integrate with other Nextiva products for a full view of audiences.

related_products.short_desc: Pollfish is a DIY, mobile-first market research platform, offering access to 450M+ mobile consumers across more than 160 countries.
related_products.features: Pollfish is the only consumer-focused market research platform that owns the full end-to-end experience, enabling brands, agencies and SMEs to reach over 500 million real mobile consumers who are randomly selected to spontaneously take surveys in the apps already installed on their devices - leading to better quality data, delivered faster and at a lower cost than traditional market research companies or legacy DIY offerings.

related_products.short_desc: The most professional survey software for your company (NPS, Customer satisfaction, HR, Employee feedback, Customer Experience)
related_products.features:
The most professional survey software for your company. Popular survey types:
- NPS, Customer satisfaction, 
- HR, Employee feedback, Customer Experience, Exit Interview, Candidate Experience
- Website widget

related_products.short_desc: CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people.
related_products.features: You need answers, and you need them quickly. Whether you're conducting ad hoc market research, want to gather quick feedback on advertising or product concepts, or launching a sophisticated insights campaign as a seasoned researcher, CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: SmartSurvey is an online survey solution that helps anyone create surveys, collect data and analyse results.
related_products.features: With the SmartSurvey SaaS platform, users can capture, analyse and report virtually any type of data via a simple, yet stylish, online survey service. SmartSurvey allows users to directly reach the people whose opinions matter the most, clients, partners, patients, students and suppliers. SmartSurvey specialises in providing survey solutions for multinational business and enterprise clients, offering dedicated support and secure data storage on UK/EU based servers.

similar_products.short_desc: Qualtrics CoreXM is the top-rated market research tool to drive better decisions with real-time insights and reporting.
similar_products.features: Faster results, deeper market knowledge with Qualtrics. Use market research tools designed to go deeper. From ad testing and product design to market segmentation and competitor benchmarking, our market research platform gives you not just the knowledge you need but the insights and actions to create transformative results. Go from 'what' to 'why' with deep processing and predictive capabilities including sentiment analysis and market trend reporting. Take control of your market research data.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Increase your market intelligence with accurate insights delivered in days, not months. Deeply understand your market, elevate your brand, and build winning products with our purpose-built insights solutions--tailored to your industry, organization, role, or need. Contact us to learn about our market research solutions like industry tracking, competitive intelligence, concept and creative testing, pricing research, and brand tracking, or work with us to custom build your own study.

similar_products.short_desc: Access real-time data, through a centralized innovation dashboard designed to support R&D strategy.
similar_products.features:
Cypris delivers actionable market intelligence to R&D and innovation teams. The platform analyzes and tracks over 500M+ data points from over 150 countries every day, including new entrants, patents, research papers, startups, and more.

Users access live data through a centralized innovation dashboard designed to support R&D strategy and request custom reports based on specific research needs. Together, the innovation dashboard and custom reports serve as a dedicated research arm.

similar_products.short_desc: Cobalt provides unparalleled market insights that help enterprise brands, agencies, and investors win the Amazon channel.
similar_products.features:
Jungle Scout Cobalt is the leading market intelligence and product insights platform built to help enterprise brands, agencies, and investors win the Amazon channel. 

Cobalt provides the industry's most accurate Amazon sales data to empower ecommerce businesses with competitive intelligence, product and category trends, market share data, and actionable insights into consumer behavior.

similar_products.short_desc: SurveyMonkey Audience is the fastest DIY market research solution.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Audience is the fastest DIY market research solution. Built right into the SurveyMonkey platform, we've integrated with panels in over 100 countries to enable global consumer research anytime, anywhere, and for any budget. Target respondents by demographics, firmographics or custom screening questions, automatically launch projects on your schedule, and start seeing results in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Our mission is to help customers find, research, and connect with privately held companies - using data to transform the M&A industry.
similar_products.features: SourceScrub is the world's leading data service for firms looking to research, find and connect with privately held companies. Our Private Company Intelligence platform allows  deal teams to take a data-driven approach in a traditionally opaque segment of the market. We combine state-of-the-art technology with an unmatched QA process resulting in the freshest and most accurate data set available.

similar_products.short_desc: Pollfish is a DIY, mobile-first market research platform, offering access to 450M+ mobile consumers across more than 160 countries.
similar_products.features: Pollfish is the only consumer-focused market research platform that owns the full end-to-end experience, enabling brands, agencies and SMEs to reach over 500 million real mobile consumers who are randomly selected to spontaneously take surveys in the apps already installed on their devices - leading to better quality data, delivered faster and at a lower cost than traditional market research companies or legacy DIY offerings.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the industry leader in market research rewards and incentives.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the leading provider of rewards and incentives for market research companies across the world. Attract and incentivize market research participants and instantly reward them with a catalog of gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. It's never been easier for market researchers to buy, track and manage digital incentives at scale. You can automate the process by integrating with our API, or send rewards individually and in bulk with the Tremendous platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Know your target market inside-out. Gauge market pulse, assess competition & keep up with the fluctuating market trends.
similar_products.features:
SurveySparrow's Market Research Software helps steer your marketing strategies in the right direction. 

Target your ideal audience across channels viz. web, mobile, social & email. Gauge Market Pulse periodically with scheduled surveys & reports. 

With advanced reporting filters, uncover critical research insights to stay ahead of competition & keep up with fluctuating market conditions.

Integrate with the top marketing tools & achieve a seamless workflow. Experience true automation.

similar_products.short_desc: Kantar Marketplace is an automated market research platform designed for marketing agility. Get rapid insights to build your brand.
similar_products.features:
Kantar Marketplace is an automated market research platform designed for insights professionals, marketers and agencies who want to test, learn and move faster.

The platform is built on a foundation of industry-leading expertise and proven methodologies, delivering results in hours, not days via best-in-class dashboards. It features a range of consumer insights tools including validated research solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily buy, send & track digital gift card rewards with Giftbit. Use our web app for individual or bulk rewards, or integrate via API.
similar_products.features:
Use Giftbit to send and track digital gift cards for your rewards and incentive needs. Buy at face value & track individually, or in bulk through our easy-to-use web application. Prefer to automate? Trigger via the apps you already use, or integrate directly with our API.

Giftbit is simple, and easy to use. Upload your recipients, customize your reward email and choose from over 50 merchant brands to offer. Get stats on everything you need to monitor the success of your program.

similar_products.short_desc: Collaborative survey platform for survey design, data collection, analysis & reporting. Available in hosted and on-premises versions.
similar_products.features:
Snap Surveys offers Snap XMP, a collaborative online survey platform for survey design, data collection, feedback management, and advanced analysis and customized reporting.
Create engaging, measurable experiences - surveys, forms, evaluations, and more. Design in any survey mode - online, mobile, offline, and scannable paper surveys - in any language. 
Host surveys using Snap Online for secure survey management or install the On-Premises Server Edition to host surveys on your own server.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use, but industry strength cloud based mobile, online, CAPI and CATI platform for the professional Market Research industry.
similar_products.features: Nfield is a powerful cloud based data collection platform for professional market research organizations. It features all you need to conduct high quality, professional and secure surveys. Nfield is available for CAPI and Online interviewing. Nfield is delivered as a service: hosted and managed by NIPO Software. For you this means: no servers, no licenses and no IT costs. NIPO Software takes care of running the IT infrastructure and making sure the platform is available 24x7.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Satisfaction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Satisfaction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Satisfaction software allows businesses to collect, organize, and manage customer feedback. These applications provide survey, complaint tracking and call reporting capabilities. Customer Satisfaction software can integrate with Customer Relationship Management and Product Management solutions to help apply the acquired feedback to business interactions and product development.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
